summary: Standalone female Nord follower with custom combat style, armor and weapons.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][size=3]First of all: I am terrible at taking screenshots and I don't have any pose mods, so feel free to upload your own ![/size]

[color=#76a5af][size=5]- Description -[/size][/color]

[size=3]A standalone female Nord follower that has a custom combat style (she perfers the bow), weapons, armor and has a few perks.
Vanilla follower framework, so mods like UFO will work with her, weapons and armor can be tempered,
but not crafted (Unique items), female only.
(male will appear as stormcloak officer or light stalhrim - depending on the version)

[/size][size=3]You can choose beetwen the 2 armors, weapons are the same in both files.
[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=3]
[color=#ff7700]The DB file REQUIRES DRAGONBORN DLC[/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/4248/?]Skyrim Special Edition Version[/url]
[/size]

[color=#76a5af][size=5]- Info -[/size][/color]

[size=3]Name: [color=#76a5af]Synea Bowmaiden[/color][/size]
[size=3]Body: [color=#76a5af]UNP
[/color]Weight: [color=#76a5af]33[/color]
Voice: [color=#76a5af]Commander (Like Aela)
[/color]Level: [color=#76a5af]1-150[/color]
Essential: [color=#76a5af]Yes[/color]
Marriable: [color=#76a5af]Yes[/color]
Armor: [color=#76a5af]Has similar stats to glass[/color]
Weapons: [color=#76a5af]again similar to glass[/color]
Location: [color=#76a5af]Wandering Jorrvaskr waiting for you[/color]
Perks: [color=#76a5af]Lightfoot, Muffled movement, Overdraw 40, Quick Shot, Armsman 20, Agile defender 20[/color]

Preset:Â [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72636/?]Get it here[/url][/size]

[size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8785167/?tb=mods&pUp=1][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8785167/?tb=mods&pUp=1]- My Other Mods -[/url][/size][/font][font=Times New Roman]
